pages.title: Meteor Summoning Circle
pages.text: The $(item)Meteor Summoning Circle$() calls down meteors from the sky, providing rare materials.$(br2)$(4)Warning: Can only be used at night!$()

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: 1. Place the Summoning Circle$(br)2. Wait for nightfall$(br)3. Right-click with a Meteor Core$(br)4. Supply large amounts of mana$(br)5. Watch the sky!$(br2)Different cores summon different meteor types with varying rewards and dangers.

pages.title: Small Meteor Core
pages.text: $(li)$(7)Mana Cost$(): 300$(li)$(7)Drops$(): Meteorite Fragments$(li)$(7)Bonus$(): Chance for Stardust$(br2)The safest option for beginners.

pages.title: Stardust Meteor Core
pages.text: $(li)$(7)Mana Cost$(): 600$(li)$(7)Drops$(): Large amounts of Stardust$(li)$(7)Bonus$(): Chance for Star Fragment$(br2)Excellent for gathering Stardust.

pages.title: Prismatic Meteor Core
pages.text: $(li)$(7)Mana Cost$(): 1500$(li)$(7)Drops$(): $(d)Prismatic Meteorite$()$(li)$(7)Bonus$(): Star Fragments, Stardust$(br2)The rarest meteor, containing legendary materials!

pages.title: Ominous Meteor Core
pages.text: $(li)$(7)Mana Cost$(): 1000$(li)$(7)Drops$(): Void Shards, Shadow Essence$(li)$(4)DANGER$(): Spawns hostile mobs!$(br2)High risk, high reward. Prepare for battle!

pages.title: Prismatic Meteorite
pages.text: $(item)Prismatic Meteorite$() is an ultra-rare material obtained only from Prismatic Meteors.$(br2)Its rainbow-like appearance hints at the cosmic powers contained within. Used for the most powerful equipment.
